item.title: Extracting Business Cycles from Time Series Data

item.title: Macroeconomics II
item.description: Lectures notes from my course on macroeconomics at the OP Jindal Global University’s School of Government and Public Policy. Check out the latest debate about India’s macroeconomic policy in my lecture notes.
